item.title: Starting a New Ambitious Project
item.description: For a very short time, I used the Spacemacs emacs distribution. It’s very nice, but I ended up backing to vim and eventually, I moved to VS Code. Code editors away, when I was using Spacemacs, I found the Magit git client.
